name: CMS Francis Lefebvre Avocats
membership:
CMS Francis Lefebvre Avocats, "société d'exercice libéral à forme anonyme (S.E.L.A.F.A.)", is a member of CMS Legal Services EEIG (CMS EEIG), a European Economic Interest Grouping that coordinates an organization of independent law firms. 
Founded in 1999, CMS is a full-service top 10 international law firm, based on the number of lawyers. With offices in +40 countries across the world, employing over 4,500 lawyers, CMS has longstanding expertise both at advising in its local jurisdictions and across borders.
goal: CMS Francis Lefebvre Avocats is one of the leading law firms in France, whose deep roots, unique positioning and highly recognised expertise enables it to deliver innovative, high-value added solutions in Tax, Corporate and Employment law. As a top 10 global law firm, CMS, the organisation to which CMS Francis Lefebvre Avocats belongs, is highly qualified to assist our clients with their projects through +40 jurisdictions worldwide. With 4,500 lawyers, CMS member firms provides our clients with advice that is tailored to their local and international needs.
euInitiatives: Our collaboration with the European Commission consists in experience and outlook exchanges (not against remuneration) in the context of Think Tanks put in place by the Commission in the context of taxation subjects, especially through experts groups : transfer pricing and VAT. See details about our participation in the experts' groups sections.
